Parameter.Label: Night Light

Item.Label: LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON

Parameter.Help: Defines the behavior of the blue LED. Default is Night Light mode where LED is on when switch is off.

Parameter.Label: Invert Switch
Parameter.Help: Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON. Note: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, remember the load will now be controlled by the right, not the left switch.
